GV02gopthbru:1_0: oṃ brahma ha vā idam agra āsīt svayaṃ tv ekam eva tad aikṣata mahad vai yakṣaṃ tad
GV02gopthbru:1_1: ekam evāsmi hantāhaṃ mad eva manmātraṃ dvitīyaṃ devaṃ nirmama iti tad abhyaśrāmyad
GV02gopthbru:1_2: abhyatapat samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya lalāṭe sneho yad ārdryam
GV02gopthbru:1_3: ājāyata tenānandat tam abravīt mahad vai yakṣaṃ suvedam avidāmaha iti /
GV02gopthbru:2: tad yad abravīt mahad vai yakṣaṃ suvedam avidāmaha iti tasmāt suvedo 'bhavattaṃ vā etaṃ suvedaṃ santaṃ sveda ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:3: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ || GpBr_1,1.1 ||
GV02gopthbru:4: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyat bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya sarvebhyo romagartebhyaḥ pṛthak svedadhārāḥ
GV02gopthbru:6_0: tābhir anandat tad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃcābhir
GV02gopthbru:6_1: vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ janayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃcābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvam āpsyāmi yad
GV02gopthbru:7: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmāt dhārā abhavaṃs taddhārāṇāṃ dhārātvaṃ yac cāsu dhriyate /
GV02gopthbru:8_0: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvaṃ janayiṣyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmāj jāyā
GV02gopthbru:8_1: abhavaṃs tajjāyānāṃ jāyātvaṃ yac cāsu puruṣo jāyate yac ca putraḥ punnāmanarakam
GV02gopthbru:8_2: anekaśatatāraṃ tasmāt trāti putras tat putrasya putratvam /
GV02gopthbru:9: tad yad abravīd ābhir vā aham idaṃ sarvam āpsyāmi yad idaṃ kiṃceti tasmād āpo
GV02gopthbru:10: 'bhavaṃs tad apām aptvam āpnoti vai sa sarvān kāmān yān kāmayate //
GV02gopthbru:11: tā apaḥ sṛṣṭvānvaikṣata tāsu svāṃ chāyām apaśyat tām asyekṣamāṇasya svayaṃ reto 'skandat tad apsu pratyatiṣṭhat tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat
GV02gopthbru:12_0: samatapat tāḥ śrāntās taptāḥ saṃtaptāḥ sārdham eva retasā dvaidham abhavaṃs tāsām
GV02gopthbru:12_1: anyā anyatarā atilavaṇā apeyā asvādvyas tā aśāntā retaḥ samudraṃ vṛtvātiṣṭhann athetarāḥ
GV02gopthbru:12_2: peyāḥ svādvyaḥ śāntās tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas
GV02gopthbru:12_3: taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyo yad reta āsīt tad abhṛjjyata yad abhṛjjyata tasmād bhṛguḥ
GV02gopthbru:12_4: samabhavat tad bhṛgor bhṛgutvaṃ bhṛgur iva vai sa sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ veda //
GV02gopthbru:13_0: sa bhṛguṃ sṛṣṭvāntaradhīyata sa bhṛguḥ sṛṣṭaḥ prāṅ ejatataṃ vāg anvavadad vāyo vāyo
GV02gopthbru:13_1: iti saṃnyavartata sa dakṣiṇāṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadat mātariśvan mātariśvann
GV02gopthbru:13_2: iti sa nyavartata sa pratīcīṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadat pavamānaḥ pavamāna iti
GV02gopthbru:13_3: sa nyavartata sa udīcīṃ diśam ejatataṃ vāg anvavadad vāta vāteti tam abravīn nanv
GV02gopthbru:14: enam etāsv evāpsv anviccheti tad yad abravīd athārvāṅ enam etāsv evāpsv anviccheti tad atharvābhavat tad atharvaṇo 'tharvatvam /
GV02gopthbru:15: tasya ha vā etasya bhagavato 'tharvaṇa ṛṣer yatheva brahmaṇī lomāni yathāṅgāni yathā
GV02gopthbru:16: prāṇa evam evāsya sarva ātmā samabhavat tam atharvāṇaṃ brahmābravīt prajāpateḥ prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā pālayasveti /
GV02gopthbru:17: tad yad abravīt prajāpateḥ prajā sṛṣṭvā pālayasveti tasmāt prajāpatir abhavat tat prajāpateḥ prajāpatitvam atharvā vai prajāpatiḥ prajāpatir iva vai sa sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti ya evaṃ
GV02gopthbru:19_0: tam atharvāṇam ṛṣim abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptāt
GV02gopthbru:19_1: daśatayān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn niramimataikarcān dvyṛcāṃs tṛcāṃś caturṛcān pañcarcān ṣaḍarcān
GV02gopthbru:20_0: tān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:20_1: saṃtaptebhyaḥ daśatayān ātharvaṇān ārṣeyān niramimataikādaśān dvādaśāṃs trayodaśāṃś
GV02gopthbru:20_2: caturdaśān pañcadaśān ṣoḍaśān saptadaśān aṣṭādaśān navadaśān viṃśān iti /
GV02gopthbru:21_0: tān atharvaṇa ṛṣīn ātharvaṇāṃś cārṣeyān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:21_1: śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo yān mantrān apaśyat sa ātharvaṇo vedo 'bhavat
GV02gopthbru:21_2: tam ātharvaṇaṃ vedam abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptād
GV02gopthbru:21_3: om iti mana evordhvam akṣaram udakrāmat sa ya icchet sarvair etair atharvabhiś cātharvaṇī
GV02gopthbru:22: sarvair ha vā asyaitair atharvabhiś cātharvaṇaiś ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.5 //
GV02gopthbru:23: sa bhūyo 'śrāmyad bhūyo 'tapyad bhūya ātmānaṃ samatapat sa ātmata eva
GV02gopthbru:24: trīṃl lokān niramimata pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ divam iti /
GV02gopthbru:25: sa khalu pādābhyām eva pṛthivīṃ niramimatodarād antarikṣam mūrdhno divam /
GV02gopthbru:26: sa tāṃs trīn lokān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas trīn devān niramimatāgniṃ vāyum ādityam iti /
GV02gopthbru:27: sa khalu pṛthivyā evāgniṃ niramimatāntarikṣād vāyuṃ diva ādityam /
GV02gopthbru:28_0: sa tāṃs trīn devān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ
GV02gopthbru:28_1: saṃtaptebhyas trīn vedān niramimata ṛgvedaṃ yajurvedaṃ sāmavedam iti agne ṛgvedaṃ
GV02gopthbru:29: sa tāṃs trīn vedān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyas tisro mahāvyāhṛtīr niramimata bhūr bhuvaḥ svar iti /
GV02gopthbru:30: bhūr ity ṛgvedāt bhuva iti yajurvedāt svar iti sāmavedāt /
GV02gopthbru:31_0: sa ya icchet sarvair etais tribhir vedaiḥ kurvīyety etābhir eva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ
GV02gopthbru:31_1: kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitais tribhir vedaiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ
GV02gopthbru:31_2: vidvān evam etābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurute // GpBr_1,1.6 //
GV02gopthbru:32: tā yā amū retaḥ samudraṃ vṛtvātiṣṭhaṃs tāḥ prācyo dakṣiṇācyaḥ pratīcya udīcyaḥ samavadravanta
GV02gopthbru:33: tad yat samavadravanta tasmāt samudra ucyate /
GV02gopthbru:34: tā bhītā abruvan bhagavantam eva vayaṃ rājānaṃ vṛṇīmaha iti /
GV02gopthbru:35: yac ca vṛtvātiṣṭhaṃs tadvaraṇo 'bhavat taṃ vā etaṃ varaṇaṃ santaṃ varuṇa ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:36: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ /
GV02gopthbru:37: sa samudrād amucyata sa mucyur abhavat taṃ vā etaṃ mucyuṃ santaṃ mṛtyur ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:38: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ
GV02gopthbru:39: / taṃ varuṇaṃ mṛtyum abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasya śrāntasya taptasya saṃtaptasya sarvebhyo 'ṅgebhyo raso 'kṣarat so 'ṅgaraso 'bhavat
GV02gopthbru:40: taṃ vā etam aṅgarasaṃ santam aṅgirā ity ācakṣate /
GV02gopthbru:41: parokṣeṇa parokṣapriyā iva hi devā bhavanti pratyakṣadviṣaḥ // GpBr_1,1.7 //
GV02gopthbru:42: tam aṅgirasam ṛṣim abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptād viṃśino 'ṅgirasa ṛṣīn niramimata tān viṃśino 'ṅgirasa
GV02gopthbru:43: ṛṣīn abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo daśatayān āṅgirasān ārṣeyān niramimata ṣoḍaśino 'ṣṭādaśino
GV02gopthbru:44: dvādaśina ekarcāṃs tṛcāṃś caturṛcān pañcarcān ṣaḍarcān dvyṛcān saptarcān iti /
GV02gopthbru:45_0: tān aṅgirasa ṛṣīn āṅgirasāṃś cārṣeyān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas
GV02gopthbru:45_1: taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyo yān mantrān apaśyatsa āṅgiraso vedo 'bhavat tam āṅgirasaṃ
GV02gopthbru:45_2: vedam abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tasmāc chrāntāt taptāt saṃtaptāj janad iti
GV02gopthbru:45_3: dvaitam akṣaraṃ vyabhavat sa ya icchet sarvair etair aṅgirobhiś cāṅgirasaiś ca kurvīyety
GV02gopthbru:45_4: etayaiva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtyā kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitair aṅgirobhiś cāṅgirasaiś
GV02gopthbru:45_5: ca kṛtaṃ bhavati ya eva veda yaś caiva vidvān evam etayā mahāvyāhṛtyā kurute // GpBr_1,1.8 //
GV02gopthbru:46: sa ūrdhvo 'tiṣṭhat sa imāṃl lokān vyaṣṭabhnāt tasmād aṅgiraso 'dhīyāna
GV02gopthbru:47: ūrdhvas tiṣṭhati tad vrataṃ sa manasā dhyāyed yad vā ahaṃ kiṃcana manasā dhyāsyāmi tathaiva tad bhaviṣyati taddha sma tathaiva bhavati /
GV02gopthbru:49: śreṣṭho ha vedas tapaso 'dhijāto brahmajyānāṃ kṣitaye saṃbabhūva ṛjyad bhūtaṃ yad asṛjyatedaṃ niveśanam anṛṇaṃ dūram asyeti /
GV02gopthbru:50: tā vā etā aṅgirasāṃ yāmayo yan menayaḥ karoti menibhir vīryaṃ ya eva veda //
GV02gopthbru:51: sa diśau 'nvaikṣata prācīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ pratīcīm udīcīṃ dhruvām ūrdhvām iti /
GV02gopthbru:52: tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyaḥ pañca vedān niramimata sarpavedaṃ piśācavedam asuravedam itihāsavedaṃ purāṇavedam iti /
GV02gopthbru:53: sa khalu prācyā eva diśaḥ sarpavedaṃ niramimata dakṣiṇasyāḥ piśācavedaṃ pratīcyā asuravedam udīcyā itihāsavedaṃ dhruvāyāś cordhvāyāś ca purāṇavedam /
GV02gopthbru:54: sa tān pañca vedān abhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tebhyaḥ śrāntebhyas taptebhyaḥ saṃtaptebhyaḥ pañca mahāvyāhṛtīr niramimata vṛdhat karad guhan mahat tad iti /
GV02gopthbru:55_0: vṛdhad iti sarpavedāt karad iti piśācavedāt guhad ity asuravedāt mahad itītihāsavedāt
GV02gopthbru:55_1: tad iti purāṇavedāt sa ya icchet sarvair etaiḥ pañcabhir vedaiḥ kurvīyety etābhir
GV02gopthbru:55_2: eva taṃ mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurvīta sarvair ha vā asyaitaiḥ pañcabhir vedaiḥ kṛtaṃ bhavati
GV02gopthbru:55_3: ya evaṃ veda yaś caivaṃ vidvān evam etābhir mahāvyāhṛtibhiḥ kurute // GpBr_1,1.10 //
GV02gopthbru:56: sa āvataś ca parāvataś cānvaikṣata tās tatraivābhyaśrāmyad abhyatapat samatapat tābhyaḥ śrāntābhyas taptābhyaḥ saṃtaptābhyaḥ śam ity ūrdhvam akṣaram udakrāmat /
GV02gopthbru:57_0: sa ya icchet sarvābhir etābhir āvadbhiś ca parāvadbhiś ca kurvīyety etayaiva taṃ

GV02gopthbru:72_0: brahma ha vai brahmāṇaṃ puṣkare sasṛje sa khalu brahmā sṛṣṭaś cintām āpede kenāham
GV02gopthbru:72_1: ekenākṣareṇa sarvāṃś ca kāmān sarvāṃś ca lokān sarvāṃś ca devān sarvāṃś ca vedān
